summary: Set in turn-of-the-century London, a woman trying to solve the mystery of a friend's murder finds that she may be the next victim.
cast: Peggy Cummins|Victor Mature|Ethel Barrymore|Vincent Price|Margo Woode|George Zucco|Patricia Medina|Rhys Williams|Norman Ainsley|Harry Allen|Frank Baker|Billy Bevan|Barbara Blaine|Clifford Brooke|Charlene Brooks|Colin Campbell|Leonard Carey|Russ Clark|Michael Dyne|Paul England|Al Ferguson|Alex Frazer|John Goldsworthy|Alec Harford|Sam Harris|Stuart Holmes|Colin Kenny|Connie Leon|Lee MacGregor|Stanley Mann|Charles McNaughton|Tom Moore|Doreen Munroe|Patrick O'Moore|Francis Pierlot|Eileen Robinson|Felippa Rock|John Rogers|Carol Savage|Dorothy Schoemer|Wallace Scott|Sally Shepherd|Gerald Oliver Smith|Phil Sudano|Basil Walker|Jacqueline Warrington|Gilbert Wilson|Victor Wood
title: Rosa silvestre
